ingredients:
1/2 oz coconut rum
1/2 oz Melon Liqueur
1/2 oz Melon Liqueur
1/4 oz Pineapple Juice
1/4 oz heavy cream
recipe:
1. Pour all into a cocktail shaker with ice
2. Shake vigourously to mix
3. Strain into a shot glass
